title: kanukoNTini (jAvaLi)
sahitya:
kanukoNTini tETatella mika kaligirO vAni marmamiTTidani


anupallavi

  vinavE alu vagalADi bOdhanaku lObaDiyunna nadaDani


caraNam 1    mATalADa pOtE maguvarO nAtO mArubalka kunnadEmOyani yuNTi 
mATi mATikA pODi ninTanuNDi cEDiyindu vacci jUcE jADalacE
    caraNam 2    virahAnala tApamu tALaka nA uramu jErcci kaugalincu koNTini 
taruNi nannu gUDani venkaTEshvaruDappuDanu konna mATalacE
